sentence: Ms. BYNUM. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize the outstanding  efforts made by one of my own constituents, Mr. Bob Sanders. Mr.  Sanders' feat of cycling across the continental United States at the  age of 85 is a true accomplishment. I include in the Record the  following article, written by Peyton…

…______

By Mr. DURBIN (for himself, Mr. Reed, Mr. Van Hollen, Ms. Warren,          Mr. Whitehouse, Mr. Blumenthal, Ms. Duckworth, Ms. Hirono, Mr.          Sanders, and Ms. Baldwin):

S. 3847. A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify  the rules relating to inverted corporations; to the Committee on  Finance.…
